languages.text: Лорд-капитан тяжело ранен{mf||а}, обкраден{mf||а} и лишен{mf||а} соратников. В пугающем месте, в котором он{mf||а} оказал{mf|ся|ась}, е{mf|му|й} как никогда важно найти безопасное укрытие, получить помощь целителя и спланировать дальнейшие действия.

The Lord Captain is heavily wounded, {mf|he|she} has been robbed, and {mf|his|her} companions are nowhere to be found. Trapped in this disturbing place, {mf|he|she}, more than ever, needs to find shelter and medical aid, and plan {mf|his|her} next steps.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан тяжело ранен{mf||а}, обкраден{mf||а} и лишен{mf||а} соратников. В пугающем месте, в котором он{mf||а} оказал{mf|ся|ась}, е{mf|му|й} как никогда важно найти безопасное укрытие, получить помощь целителя и спланировать дальнейшие действия.

traits.locale_text: Lord Captain is heavily wounded, robbed, and {mf|his|her} companions are nowhere to be found. Trapped in this disturbing place, {mf|he|she}, more than ever, needs to find shelter, get medical aid, and plan {mf|his|her} further actions.

The Lord Captain is heavily wounded, {mf|he|she} has been robbed, and {mf|his|her} companions are nowhere to be found. Trapped in this disturbing place, {mf|he|she}, more than ever, needs to find shelter and medical aid, and plan {mf|his|her} next steps.

The Lord Captain is heavily wounded, {mf|he|she} has been robbed, and {mf|his|her} companions are nowhere to be found. Trapped in this disturbing place, {mf|he|she}, more than ever, needs to find shelter and medical aid, and plan {mf|his|her} next steps.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} est gravement {mf|blessé|blessée}. {mf|Il|elle}, s'est fait dépouiller et a perdu ses compagnons. {mf|Pris|prise} au piège dans cet endroit épouvantable, {mf|il|elle} doit se mettre à l'abri et se soigner avant de décider de ce qu'il convient de faire.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is heavily wounded, {mf|he|she} has been robbed, and {mf|his|her} companions are nowhere to be found. Trapped in this disturbing place, {mf|he|she}, more than ever, needs to find shelter and medical aid, and plan {mf|his|her} next steps.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} est gravement {mf|blessé|blessée}. {mf|Il|elle}, s'est fait dépouiller et a perdu ses compagnons. {mf|Pris|prise} au piège dans cet endroit épouvantable, {mf|il|elle} doit se mettre à l'abri et se soigner avant de décider de ce qu'il convient de faire.

languages.text: 行商浪人受了重伤，被困在这个令人不安的地方，所有东西都被抢走了，同伴也无处可寻。{mf|他|她}比以往任何时候都需要安全的住处与医疗援助，从而计划下一步的行动。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is heavily wounded, {mf|he|she} has been robbed, and {mf|his|her} companions are nowhere to be found. Trapped in this disturbing place, {mf|he|she}, more than ever, needs to find shelter and medical aid, and plan {mf|his|her} next steps.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人受了重伤，被困在这个令人不安的地方，所有东西都被抢走了，同伴也无处可寻。{mf|他|她}比以往任何时候都需要安全的住处与医疗援助，从而计划下一步的行动。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは重傷を負い、追い剥ぎに遭った。仲間たちはどこにも見当たらない。このような不穏な場所に閉じ込められた自由開拓者は、避難場所と医療物資を見つけ、次の手を打つ必要がある。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is heavily wounded, {mf|he|she} has been robbed, and {mf|his|her} companions are nowhere to be found. Trapped in this disturbing place, {mf|he|she}, more than ever, needs to find shelter and medical aid, and plan {mf|his|her} next steps.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは重傷を負い、追い剥ぎに遭った。仲間たちはどこにも見当たらない。このような不穏な場所に閉じ込められた自由開拓者は、避難場所と医療物資を見つけ、次の手を打つ必要がある。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain ist schwer verwundet, er wurde ausgeraubt und seine Gefährten sind nirgendwo zu finden. Gefangen in dieser Hölle muss er dringend Zuflucht und medizinische Hilfe finden und seine nächsten Schritte planen.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is heavily wounded, {mf|he|she} has been robbed, and {mf|his|her} companions are nowhere to be found. Trapped in this disturbing place, {mf|he|she}, more than ever, needs to find shelter and medical aid, and plan {mf|his|her} next steps.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain ist schwer verwundet, er wurde ausgeraubt und seine Gefährten sind nirgendwo zu finden. Gefangen in dieser Hölle muss er dringend Zuflucht und medizinische Hilfe finden und seine nächsten Schritte planen.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán está gravemente herid{mf|o|a}, le han robado y de sus compañeros no queda ni rastro. Ahora más que nunca necesita encontrar un refugio y asistencia médica y planificar su siguiente acción.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is heavily wounded, {mf|he|she} has been robbed, and {mf|his|her} companions are nowhere to be found. Trapped in this disturbing place, {mf|he|she}, more than ever, needs to find shelter and medical aid, and plan {mf|his|her} next steps.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán está gravemente herid{mf|o|a}, le han robado y de sus compañeros no queda ni rastro. Ahora más que nunca necesita encontrar un refugio y asistencia médica y planificar su siguiente acción.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan ağır yaralanmış, eşyaları çalınmış ve yoldaşları ortalıkta yok. Bu rahatsız edici yerde tıkılıp kaldı, kendine bir sığınak ile tıbbi destek bulmaya ve sıradaki adımlarını planlamaya hiç olmadığı kadar ihtiyacı var.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain is heavily wounded, {mf|he|she} has been robbed, and {mf|his|her} companions are nowhere to be found. Trapped in this disturbing place, {mf|he|she}, more than ever, needs to find shelter and medical aid, and plan {mf|his|her} next steps.
